DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate change hemodynamic profile bio reactance technique TURP elderly patient .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Hemodynamic Profiles Bio Reactance Technique During TURP Elderly Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 ) Twenty ( ASA status I ~ III ) patient , age 65 80 yr old , scheduled transurethral resection prostate spinal anesthesia 1. contraindication spinal anesthesia include hypersensitivity local anaesthetic , bleed diathesis , infection puncture site , preexist neurological disease . 2. history coronary artery bypass surgery 3. history dementia 4. difficulty understanding informed consent refuse sign inform consent 5. patient height 150 cm
